actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to correct an inequity in the eligibility for basic allowance for quarters for members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Amends the basic allowance for quarters for the armed services to entitle otherwise ineligible servicemembers to such allowance if they are ordered to field or sea duty without advanced warning or for an indefinite but not permanent period of time.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to correct an inequity in the eligibility for basic allowance for quarters for members of the uniformed services.
